short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dataDyne Communication Extension to interact with the Service Host

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Native Messaging Server for google Chrome. Using C# and the NamedPipedServerStream class, you can send commands to Chrome to open and close tabs and windows, change URL's, and interact with chrome in a number of ways
